author: marcosc
msg: Fixed 1 fuzzy translation and 1 untranslated message.

author: kfogel
msg: Fix an interface, as suggested by Vivek <vivek@collab.net>:
(svn_cl__try): Allow 'success' parameter to be NULL, for callers who
don't care to know the success status.

author: pburba
msg: Port of svn merge via file:/// for OS/400.
Disable the --diff3-cmd option as we have no plans to support that in the port.
(main): Convert opt_arg to utf-8 prior to passing it to
(display_prop_diffs): Make APR_EOL_STRs part of format string passed to
file_print_from_utf8 rather than a variable arg.
(check_scheme_match): Substitute SVN_UTF8_* symbols for character constants.
(diff_content_changed): Substitute SVN_UTF8_* symbols for character constants
and use APR_PRSPRINTF2 rather than apr_psrintf.
(parse_one_rev): Use APR_IS_ASCII_DIGIT and APR_IS_ALPHA macros rather than
apr_isdigit and apr_isalpha.  Convert args to SVN_STR_TO_REV to ebcdic.
Substitute SVN_UTF8_* symbols for character constants.

author: xsteve
